title: BWSSB fails residents after collecting Kaver connectioni charges
description:
The residents and businesses, providing many jobs, are facing severe hardship due to no Kaveri water connection. Residents have been paying property taxes since 2006, yet we have not received any roads, or water connection. All Borewells in the layout, have gone dry and water tankers are charging exorbitant amounts to supply water. Last year the BWSSB issued notices and threatened, all residents and apartments, with blocking of sewage lines, if they did not apply and pay the charges to BWSSB for Kaveri water connection. Almost 60% owners and apartments have paid the demand charges of BWSSB. Others are waiting for BWSSB to put the Main Kaveri water line, into the layout, as they don't trust thr BWSSB, to keep their commitment. BWSSB, started the work and immediately stopped the laying of the main water line. When contacted, they are blaming the BBMP for not giving road cutting permission. This is all rubbish excuses. Even our local people representatives, are showing no concern for the hardship faced by the citizens. The situation, due to summer is now alarming. I urge our local leaders to kindly look into the matter and clear unnecessary bottlenecks, cause by people with vested interests. 

General Secretary SSLOA
